handwriting.utils.inference_utils.sample_fixed_sequence(settings, rnn, truth_text='an input string')[source]¶

Utility to sample an fixed sequence from a RNN. USeful for debugging

Strategy: Initialize sequence with 1,0,0 : i.e. end of stroke, no previously drawn data Encode the input text string with one-hot Pass the sequence and onehot to the RNN and obtain Mixture Gaussian parameters Then sample from this mixture gaussian and iterate until a threshold is reached

Parameters:
  • settings (ExperimentSettings) – custom class to hold hyperparams
  • rnn (nn.Model) – the model we want to sample from
  • truth_text (str) – sentence to write
Returns:

plot_data (PlotData) custom class holding data arrays for plots
handwriting.utils.inference_utils.sample_test_MDN(settings, model, X)[source]¶

Utility to sample an unconditional handwriting sequence from a RNN

Strategy: Initialize sequence with 1,0,0 : i.e. end of stroke, no previously drawn data Pass the sequence to the RNN and obtain Mixture Gaussian parameters Then sample from this mixture gaussian and iterate until settings.sampling_len is reached

Parameters:
  • settings (ExperimentSettings) – custom class to hold hyperparams
  • model (nn.Model) – the model we want to sample from
  • X (np.array) – the data at which to sample
Returns:

sampled points
Return type:

(np.array)
handwriting.utils.inference_utils.sample_unconditional_sequence(settings, rnn)[source]¶

Utility to sample an unconditional handwriting sequence from a RNN

Strategy: Initialize sequence with 1,0,0 : i.e. end of stroke, no previously drawn data Pass the sequence to the RNN and obtain Mixture Gaussian parameters Then sample from this mixture gaussian and iterate until settings.sampling_len is reached

Parameters:
  • settings (ExperimentSettings) – custom class to hold hyperparams
  • rnn (nn.Model) – the model we want to sample from
Returns:

plot_data (PlotData) custom class holding data arrays for plots
handwriting.utils.inference_utils.stroke_sampling(settings, mdnparams, e_logit=None)[source]¶

Utility to sample from MDN, possibly also sampling an end of stroke token

Parameters:
  • settings (ExperimentSettings) – custom class to hold hyperparams
  • mdnparams (MDNparams) – custom namedtuple to hold MDN parameters
  • e_logit (torch.Tensor) – the predicted end of stroke token.
Returns:

custom class to hold stroke sampling results
Return type:

params (SampleParams)
